# shoutout
Python jumbo letter printer

# Install
pip install shoutout

# Usage

```python
import shoutout
shoutout.loud("Hello!!")
```

<pre>         
	
 #   #   ####   #       #        ####     ###    ### 
 #   #   #      #       #       #    #    ###    ### 
 #####   ####   #       #       #    #    ##     ##  
 #   #   #      #       #       #    #               
 #   #   ####   #####   #####    ####     ##     ##  

</pre> 

or you can create an object!

```python
import shoutout

loud_msg = shoutout.ShoutOut("World!!")
print loud_msg
```

<pre>         
          
 #       #    ####    #####    #       ####      ###    ### 
 #       #   #    #   #    #   #       #    #    ###    ### 
 #   #   #   #    #   # ###    #       #    #    ##     ##  
  # # # #    #    #   #   #    #       #    #               
   #   #      ####    #    #   #####   ####      ##     ##  
      

</pre>
